price: 46. Ils ont tramé leurs intrigues, mais leurs intrigues restaient sous le contrôle d’Allah même si ces intrigues étaient en mesure de détruire les montagnes.
arabic: وَقَدۡ مَكَرُواْ مَكۡرَهُمۡ وَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ مَكۡرُهُمۡ وَإِن كَانَ مَكۡرُهُمۡ لِتَزُولَ مِنۡهُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqad makarū makrahum waʿinda al-lahi makruhum wa-in kāna makruhum litazūla min'hu al-jibālu
